content: What if you could start your own global trend, followed by everyone? What would it be?
What if you could listen to one person's phone calls without being discovered? Who would it be?
What if you could take the one thing you're most often asked about and share your advice with the entire world? What would your advice be?
What if you were asked to write a self-help book? What advice would you give to others about living a better life?
What if you had the chance to help somebody get ahead in their life? Who would it be and what would you help them achieve?
What if you were asked to give a speech on the most valuable thing you've ever learned? What would you talk about?
What if you could turn back the clock and be more kind to one person you have known? Who would that be?
What if you could explore the single biggest source of fear in your life? What would be the main source?
What if you could pinpoint the exact moment when you felt most free? What was your life like at that moment?
What if you wrote a one-item bucket list? What is the one experience you've never had that you'd most like to do?
What if you could get a second opportunity with one situation or one person? How would you use your second chance?
What if you could commit to always following your instinct and emotions in one particular aspect of your life? What area would that be?
What if you could take an incredible deed someone did for you and share that experience with one other person? Which experience would you choose?
What if you could explore one persistent dream you've had for your life that you haven't pursued yet? What dream would you want to pursue?
What if you could relive the single most important and impactful experience you've had so far? What experience would you choose to relive?
What if you could snap your fingers and relive the last moment you felt completely respected and valued? What moment would you choose?
